title: Why is AlexIch in the NA Summer Promotions?
body: Didn't he leave Gambit and the EU LCS because there was too much travelling?

replies.body: He came to NA because it was easier for him to get a visa here than in EU
Ok, thanks. Was a bit confused. It's nice to see him back on the big scene.
Alex Ich is a mid lane for hire. Selling LCS Spots. Kappa
He moved to NA, and is a substitute because Kyle left TDK just before the promotion series.
